air-quality-location-panel.error: Could not get an index value for your location
air-quality-location-panel.hint: Modelled air quality index for your location

annual-phenomenon-buttons: Modelled annual mean value for this location:

belaqi-chart.error: Unfortunately, an error occurred while determining the graph.

belaqi-user-location-slider.current-location-description: Activate this option to display air quality data for your current location.
belaqi-user-location-slider.current-location-error-1: You could change the settings of the location service of your device to high accuracy mode.
belaqi-user-location-slider.current-location-error-2: If you previously configured personal user locations, these should be available if you swipe this screen to the left.
belaqi-user-location-slider.current-location-error-3: Otherwise you can configure a location manually:
belaqi-user-location-slider.current-location-error-header: Your device was not able to establish your current location.
belaqi-user-location-slider.loading-current-location: Your device is determining your current location
belaqi-user-location-slider.locate-delayed-information: Your device was not able to establish your current location.

belaqi-wheel.error-occured: It is taking longer than usual to fetch the data. Please try again later.
belaqi-wheel.modelled-hint: Modelled air quality index for this location
belaqi-wheel.no-index-ascertained: No BelAQI index could be ascertained. This can be the case that the location is not in Belgium.

customize-personal-alerts.alert-sensitive-active: Health advice for people sensitive to air pollution
customize-personal-alerts.hint: To use this functionality, the app needs to keep running in the background. Your location is only determined once for the choosen verification interval if you want to have the air quality checked for your current location. All personally configured locations will also be checked.

home.noAlert: no official messages concerning periods of increased air pollution

chart.message: This chart shows the evolution of the BelAQI air quality index. The vertical blue line indicates the current value.

wheel.message: This dial shows the current BelAQI air quality index for your location. This index combines the modelled concentrations of different pollutants depending on their health effects.

three.addLocationToList: Add to the list of locations
three.header: Choose the locations for which you want to receive personalised notifications

two.header: For which region would you like to receive official notifications?

map.dataset-selection-hint: Please select one or more timeseries to display in diagram
map.error: An error occured. It is not possible to determine data for the selected pollutant.

information-popup.list-pm10: or particulate matter with a diameter below 10 micrometer
information-popup.list-pm25: or particulate matter with a diameter below 2,5 micrometer
information-popup.text: The actual measured concentrations of the nearest monitoring stations are given here. The different pollutants are:

network.geolocationDenied: You have not allowed the use of your location to the app.
network.geolocationDeniedExplanation: If you want to make use of the "current position" functionalities, you can activate the location service of your device here.
network.geolocationDisabledExplanation: If you want to make use of the "current position" functionalities, please enable the location service of your device.
network.geolocationEnabledExplanation: The "current position" functionalities are available to you.
network.geolocationPartialExplanation: To have an optimal geolocation, please activate the location method "high accuracy".

no-network-connection.body: Your device has no data network connection. The BelAir app heavily depends on fresh data being fetched from our servers. Please activate a data network (mobile data or wifi connection) and refresh the app or try again when you are in range of a data network you have access to.

index-1.non-sensitive: It is very healthy today to be physically active outside. By reducing emissions, we get more of these healthy days and also decrease the effects of the low-term exposure.
index-1.sensitive: It is very healthy today to be physically active outside. By reducing emissions, we get more of these healthy days and also decrease the effects of the low-term exposure.

index-10.sensitive: Limit physical exertion. Consult your doctor about appropriate changes to medication you might be taking.

index-2.non-sensitive: It is very healthy today to be physically active outside. By reducing emissions, we get more of these healthy days and also decrease the effects of the low-term exposure.
index-2.sensitive: It is very healthy today to be physically active outside. By reducing emissions, we get more of these healthy days and also decrease the effects of the low-term exposure.

index-3.non-sensitive: You do not have to adjust your usual physical activities because of the air quality.
index-3.sensitive: If you experience discomfort, you can reduce heavy/long physical effort.

index-4.non-sensitive: You do not have to adjust your usual physical activities because of the air quality.
index-4.sensitive: If you experience discomfort, you can reduce heavy/long physical effort.

index-5.non-sensitive: You do not have to adjust your usual physical activities because of the air quality.
index-5.sensitive: Reduce your physical effort. Consult your doctor about appropriate changes to medication you might be taking.

index-6.non-sensitive: You do not have to adjust your usual physical activities because of the air quality.
index-6.sensitive: Reduce your physical effort. Consult your doctor about appropriate changes to medication you might be taking.

index-7.non-sensitive: You do not have to adjust your usual physical activities because of the air quality.
index-7.sensitive: Reduce your physical effort. Consult your doctor about appropriate changes to medication you might be taking.

index-8.sensitive: Limit physical exertion. Consult your doctor about appropriate changes to medication you might be taking.

index-9.sensitive: Limit physical exertion. Consult your doctor about appropriate changes to medication you might be taking.
